articles.title: Amid Russian Invasion, Ukraine Gets European Union Candidate Status - NDTV
articles.description: European Union leaders granted candidate status Thursday to Ukraine and Moldova in a strong show of support against Russia's invasion, as the United States said it was sending Kyiv more high-precision rocket systems.
articles.content:
Zelensky said that "Ukraine's future is within the EU".

articles.author: Laurence Norman
articles.title: Ukraine Becomes an Official EU Membership Candidate - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The decision was agreed to by European Union leaders at a summit in Brussels and fulfills one of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky’s biggest requests of European countries.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: European Union unanimously approves Ukraine's candidacy for membership - 9News
articles.description: The European Union has agreed to put Ukraine on a path toward EU membership.

articles.author: Mark MacKinnon
articles.title: European Union grants Ukraine candidacy status after nearly two-decade struggle - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: European Council president Charles Michel said Thursday that all 27 EU leaders had supported opening the door to Ukraine and neighbouring Moldova
articles.content:

articles.author: Lenin Ndebele
articles.title: Eswatini: 'Winter revolution' cripples international company, locals affected - News24
articles.description: Eswatini's "winter revolution" has derailed a European Union-funded project as pro-democracy groups push for the abdication of King Mswati III.
articles.content:
• Inyatsi Construction's European Union-funded water harvesting project is in limbo after attacks.
  • The company has been forced to shut down after three terror attacks this year.

articles.author: Emer Moreau
articles.title: Give 16-year-olds the vote? TDs are set to debate a motion calling for a referendum on the move - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Thomas Pringle TD, who initiated the bill, says he would like to see the referendum held alongside the local and European elections in 2024.
articles.content:
TDS WILL THIS evening debate a bill proposing a referendum on reducing the voting age to 16.
